about_the_game:
The Blackout Z: Original Soundtrack is a collection of 7 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!


  • Hat Verloren
  • Pitch Black
  • Cannibalism as a way to Survive
  • Procrastination
  • Round Up
  • Delta lota Eta
  • Lost my boots
  • Hat verloren (looped)
  • Pitch Black (looped)
  • Cannibalism as a way to Survive (looped)
  • Procrastination (looped)
  • Round Up (looped)
  • Delta lota Eta (looped)
  • Lost my boots (looped)

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Blackout Z Slaughterhouse Edition\Soundtrack"
detailed_description:
WISHLIST BURNING SKIES


About the Game

The Blackout Z: Original Soundtrack is a collection of 7 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!


  • Hat Verloren
  • Pitch Black
  • Cannibalism as a way to Survive
  • Procrastination
  • Round Up
  • Delta lota Eta
  • Lost my boots
  • Hat verloren (looped)
  • Pitch Black (looped)
  • Cannibalism as a way to Survive (looped)
  • Procrastination (looped)
  • Round Up (looped)
  • Delta lota Eta (looped)
  • Lost my boots (looped)

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Blackout Z Slaughterhouse Edition\Soundtrack"
